encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: The position of the *apostrophe* tags is ok; l. 4 and 11: change accent on Ὀδυσσεὺς to acute; l. 5: change accent on αὐτὸς to acute; l. 7 change accent on ἀλοιφή to acute; l. 9: μετελθὼν, acute; l. 15, ἀδμὴς, acute; l. 19, ἀνὴρ acute. Otherwise, implement changes requested by M. Sampson, namely: in l. 22, there is no superscripted letter (rather, the sigma of ὥς in l. 10 should be ὣ\ς/--agreed!); l. 25 insert diairesis on ἐϋπλόκαμοισι. Also make the requested changes in metadata (except Apis link) and finalize.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: The position of the *apostrophe* tags is ok; l. 4 and 11: change accent on Ὀδυσσεὺς to acute; l. 5: change accent on αὐτὸς to acute; l. 7 change accent on ἀλοιφή to acute; l. 9: μετελθὼν, acute; l. 15, ἀδμὴς, acute; l. 19, ἀνὴρ acute. Otherwise, implement changes requested by M. Sampson, namely: in l. 22, there is no superscripted letter (rather, the sigma of ὥς in l. 10 should be ὣ\ς/--agreed!); l. 25 insert diairesis on ἐϋπλόκαμοισι. Also make the requested changes in metadata (except Apis link) and finalize.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Fine, generally. Move apostrophes to after the *apostrophe* markup (or else the app.crit. suggests the scribe wrote two apostrophes); l. 4 change accent on Odysseus to acute; l. 7 change accent on ἀλοιφή to acute; in l. 22, there is no superscripted letter (rather, the sigma of ὥς in l. 10 should be ὣ\ς/); l. 25 insert diairesis on ἐϋπλόκαμοισι. Meta: inventory number is incorrect (should be 1623b: ed.pr. is wrong); also, add acquisition information (purchased from Nahman in Paris in 1935). Note for finalization: this is yale.apis.0016234200.
